commentBody: Will be so sorry to lose this outsized personality.  Would appreciate the sportswriters telling their readership how he came to a community who cares for him precisely because he is different.  Would appreciate more about the respect he commands from his teammates PRECISELY because he is a team player. AND would appreciate more about his brilliance off the field; who else can hobnob when he cares to with billionaires so that they will fund the project he cares about most: his rejuvenation of the tougher part of Oakland, where he lives most of the time - and stay silent when reporters ask him stupid questions? we will miss him, and we also believe he'll be back for us in some way.
